birthdate.Tyler Lockwood: * [[Timeline|February 10, 1992/1993]]refIn ''The Vampire Diaries'', he was 17 years old as a junior in high school and graduated at 18 years old, placing his birthday in 1993; however, in ''The Originals'', his obituary states it's 1992. See this [http://vampirediaries.wikia.com/wiki/File:TO407-158-Tyler_Obituary.png image].</ref> — [[Timeline|December 2017]] <small>([[Mystic Falls]], Aged 24/25)</small>
birthdate.Stefan Salvatore: * [[Timeline|November 1, 1846]] <small>([[Mystic Falls]]; Aged 17/171)</small> refStefan told [[Elena Gilbert|Elena]] that he's a 164 year old vampire as of September 2011 in ''[[For Whom the Bell Tolls]]''.</ref>
birthdate.Sheila Bennett: * [[Timeline|1956]]refIn ''[[Bloodlines]]'', Sheila states that she was barely a teenager, approximately 13 years old, in October 1969. This would place her date of birth around 1956.</ref> <small>(Age 53)</small>
birthdate.Isobel Flemming: * [[Timeline|October 17, 1975]] <small>([[Grove Hill, Virginia|Grove Hill]], Age 31/34)</small>refLook at [http://vampirediaries.wikia.com/wiki/File:IsobelLicense.png this] picture</ref>
birthdate.Bree: * c. [[Timeline|1971]] <small>(Age 41refIn ''[[Bloodlines]]'', Bree states that she was a college freshman twenty years prior 2009.</ref>)</small>
